timeline.bodyText: I think 90 should be fileNameShorteningThreshold - 10 otherwise the numbers are very magic, the 10 for extension adjustment is still a little magic but at least it would be an adjustment off the constant
timeline.author: mikehardy

timeline.message:
File import: Shorten Filenames to 100 characters

We URLEncode filenames, and CJK characters are 9x the size when this
happens.

Now, we truncate any filenames which would be too long after this.

This ensures that we avoid "FileSystemException: File name too long"
